text.div:
serviceRequestPatientFamilyNameSearchParameter

Parameter patient.family:string

Searches for serviceRequest based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?patient.family={familyName}

ResourceServiceRequest
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesServiceRequest
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: serviceRequestPatientFamilyNameSearchParameter
description: Searches for serviceRequest based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/ServiceRequest?patient.family={familyName}
